black.text:
What happened
at Crystal's last
party?

What's the first sign
of simulation
sickness?

_______: The latest
in VR technology.

_______ is the
worst VR peripheral
I ever Kickstarted.

Coming soon
to AltspaceVR:
_______ live in VR!

How's this for a
band name: _______
and the _______s!

Imma let you finish,
but _______ had the
best _______ of all
time.

Make America
_______ Again!

Why did Grumpy
threaten a
small child?

I brought home
_______ for
the kids.

When life gives you
_______, make _______.

We're all out of _______,
I'll just use _______
instead.

Hey, would you like
to see my pet _______?
Who's your _______?
What is the safeword?
How's your _______?

Scientists recently
discovered a new element
which they have
appropriately named _______.
_______ for president!

One time, I shoved
a whole _______ in my
ear!

Nooo! You can't leave
me here with these _______!

My favorite boyscout
badge is the _______ badge.

I value your _______,
not your _______.

Sometimes I like to lay
in my _______ and pretend
I am a _______.

white.text:
The early signs
of simulation
sickness.

Putting your Vive
wand through
a $5000 TV.

Cramming a baby
in a toaster.

A dagger made out
of a toothbrush.

A secret that isn't
a secret anymore.
